name: Scorpion Blessing
description:
When your Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion uses Technique: Remove this effect, and for each stack of Scorpion Blessing, the DMG dealt by this instance of Technique +1.
(Scorpion Blessingcan stack, no limit)
